adept.common

Class HltContentContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.HltContentContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HltContentContainer
extends HltContent
implements Serializable
    The Class HltContentContainer, which contains the full annotation of an input Document, including objects such as Coreference, EntityMention, Event, Passage, Relation and Sentence.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
